name: Tinct
description:
Tinct - Tap, Tap, Tap to get your player through your color!

* Tap, Tap, Tap to pass your player through each obstacle.
* Follow the color to cross each obstacle.
* Patients & Timing to reach the highest score possible.
* Go through different phases to unlock new players.

Please send all feedback to niraj.makhare44@gmail.com I'd love to hear from you!
